--- khamkain <khamkain@...> wrote:

> Remus slowed down his speed has he met with cyclonus and scourge.
> While he came closer, he sent is location to Maximal or iron skull
> that migth get the signal. Keeping as safe distance he stared at
> Cyclonus with stange mix of rage and serenity in his eyes. 
> 
> Remus was speaking calmly and firmly : Then ... WHaT? yOu wilL.. gIVe
> ...ThE... MATRIX... tO uniCroN... aNd BE... PrAISEd... LiKE... thE
> gOOd... DoGs... THat you... ArE? dO YOU... reaLLy... Think... He
> is...
> GoINg to... NEED... you... FoR..ever? DeSTRoyINg... tHe...
> UnivERS!...
> ThEN... YOU... 
> 
> Remus waited for there reaction ready for any possibility.

As Remus approached where Cyclonus stood, it was a strange scene that
presented itself - Sweeps swirled in the skies and others emerged out
of a deep cave. There is the smell of newly turned earth as if some
digging has been done recently. It is also obvious that Cyclonus is
benefiting from the Matrix, his optics glowing as he radiated some new
power, and most horrifying of all, there was no hint of the earlier
damage he had recieved in his battle with Rodimus.  

Cyclonus stood before five cybertronian forms, warriors from their
build and weapon distribution. They each lay on the ground and looked
to be in stasis lock due to extensive damage, but otherwise repairable.
From the look of them they had received this damage quite some time
ago.

Cyclonus turned to look at Remus, and for the briefest of moments a
strange mosaic of emotions passed fleetingly across his face -
enlightenment? anger? frustration? wonder? it is difficult to define,
but then all too quickly disappear as he spoke, "You speak of things
that you have no knowledge of Maximal. Silence would be your ally now."


As Cyclonus spoke several Sweeps in robot mode stepped up to Remus from
the sides and rear, weapons trained on him, they reach out to hold him
in place. At the same time Cyclonus turned away from Remus to gaze upon
the forms before him. 

�I did not allow your presence here to bandy useless words with you.�
Cyclonus� voice is clear and powerful as he directed his words to
Remus, �No doubt you have reported our position to your comrades, but
it is of no consequence, they will arrive too late.� Cyclonus gestured
at the warriors before him, �However you will be able to report this to
your superiors. Let them know the gift they have given us.�

Cyclonus stood still for a moment as more Sweeps stepped to Remus� side
to hold him in place. Then as if in an exhalation Cyclonus began
bathing each of the forms in a scintillating cacophony of power,
vaguely reminiscent of the power so recently shared between he and
Rodimus, but darker and more sinister. Then swiftly the forms began to
mold, twist and change ...

Preston
(Da'minion)
